html:
Amazon has started their early Black Friday Deals on many Apple products, so if you’ve been planning on shopping this holiday season for some great deals on Apple gear, this is a great place to get started.

M3 MacBook Air up to 23% Off

Amazon is offering the M3 series of MacBook Air in both 13″ and 15″ screen sizes for up to 23% off, or $300 off the MSRP. Perhaps best of all is remembering that Apple recently made 16GB the base default for RAM, making these deals even better when considered against their upgrade prices from just a few months ago.

15″ MacBook Air M3

  • 15″ MacBook Air M3 – 16GB RAM / 256GB SSD – $1044 (down $255 from $1299) from $1699)
  • 15″ MacBook Air M3 – 16GB RAM / 512GB SSD – $1234 (down $265 from $1499) from $1699)
  • 15″ MacBook Air M3 – 24GB RAM / 512GB SSD – $1424 (down $275 from $1699) from $1699)

13″ MacBook Air M3

  • 13″ MacBook Air M3 – 16GB RAM / 256GB SSD – $849 (down $250 from $1099)
  • 13″ MacBook Air M3 – 16GB RAM / 512GB SSD – $1049 (down $250 from $1299)
  • 13″ MacBook Air M3 – 24GB / 512GB SSD – $1249 (down $250 from $1499)

M4 MacBook Pro 14″ up to $300 Off

The MacBook Pro series is nicely discounted by Amazon, featuring an M4 chip and offering a ton of power, and they’re available in 14″ and 16″ display sizes in various configurations. Two of the better deals are:

  • M4 MacBook Pro 14″ 16GB / 512GB for $1399 (down from $1599
  • M4 Max MacBook Pro 16″ 36GB / 1TB for $3199 (down from $3499)

iPads from $279

Amazon also has some great deals on iPad models, whether it’s the iPad 10th gen for $279, or the all new powerful M2 iPad Air at a nice discount in both screen sizes, and in various colors, you’ve got deals across the board:

  • M2 iPad Air 13″ – $699 (down from $799)
  • M2 iPad Air 11″ – $499 (down from $599)
  • iPad 10.9″ 10th generation – $279 (down from $349)

Apple Watch Series 10 for $329 (18% off)

Apple Watch Series 10 has a bigger and brighter screen, faster battery charging, health insights and fitness tracking capabilities, crash and fall detection, always-on display, and much more, making it a fantastic Apple Watch and now at a great price too.

  • Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down $70 from $399, various colors and bands)

AirPods Pro at 34% off

Amazon is offering some significant discounts AirPods Pro 2nd gen:

  • AirPods Pro 2nd gen with USB-C Charging for $159 (down from $249)

AirTags 4-pack for $73

AirTag personal trackers are super useful for many purposes and right now you can spend $73 and get a 4-pack of them:

  • AirTags – 4-pack – $73 (down from $99)
